com.nmoumoulidis.opensensor.model
Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
  android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      com.nmoumoulidis.opensensor.model.DatabaseHelper

public class DatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper

SQLite database management class (extends SQLiteOpenHelper), used for storing persistently data on the phone, that were retrieved from a Wi-Fi connected OpenSensor Station.

Author:
Nikos Moumoulidis
